title: MnO<sub>2</sub> decoration onto the guava leaves: A sustainable and cost-effective material for methylene blue dye removal
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Noufal Komby Abdulla, Elham A. Alzahrani, Poonam Dwivedi, Shruti Goel, Sumbul Hafeez, Mihir Khulbe, Sharf Ilahi Siddiqui, Seungdae Oh
